headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid MKC and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the past six months, McCormick’s shares (currently trading at $64.80) have posted a disappointing 19.3% loss, well below the S&P 500’s 16.2% gain. This might have investors contemplating their next move.
